00042     inline Value Frame::getSlot( Symbol& symbol )
00043     {
00044         if (slots().find( &symbol ) != slots().end())
00045             return slots()[&symbol];
00046         else
00047             return _nil_;
00048     }
00049 
00050     inline Value Frame::setSlot( Symbol& symbol, Value value )
00051     {
00052         if (slots().find( &symbol ) != slots().end())
00053             slots()[&symbol].decrRef();
00054 
00055         value.incrRef();
00056 
00057         return slots()[&symbol] = value;
00058     }
00059 
00060 
00061     inline Value Frame::send( Symbol& selector, Array& args )
00062     {
00063         return send( selector, args, this );
00064     }
00065 
00066     inline Value Frame::send( Symbol& selector, Array& args, Value self )
00067     {
00068         BEG( "Frame::send( sel = " << selector.getName().c_str() << ", self = " << self.inspect() << " )" );
00069 
00070         Value result = -1;
00071 
00072         Value method = getSlot( selector );
00073 
00074         if (method.getFrame() != _nil_.getFrame())
00075         {
00076             Array margs( this, &args );
00077 
00078             try
00079             {
00080                 result = method.eval( margs, self );
00081             }
00082             catch( string error )
00083             {
00084                 cout << "** " << inspect() << "::" << selector.getName() << ": " << error << endl;
00085             }
00086         }
00087         else if (proto() != NULL)
00088         {
00089             result = proto()->send( selector, args, self );
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093             cout << "*** " << self.inspect() << " Slot not found: " << selector.getName() << endl;
00094         }
00095 
00096         END( result.inspect() );
00097 
00098         return result;
00099     }
